item.title: hello hugo
item.author: Author
item.description: “Hello World”, or should I say “Hello Hugo.” I’ve wanted to start blogging again for sometime now. What do they say? The best time to start a blog was 30 years ago, the next best time is today. … or something like that. I’m playing around with some hugothemes tonight. Hopefully I’ll manage to at least keep the content going. My intention is to keep this content short. My inspiration is something akin to the Today I Learned (til) format.
